GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/categories.description: serves an array of all categories

categories.description: Players attempt to uncover each other's hidden role

GET /api/reviews.description: serves an array of all reviews

GET /api/reviews/:review_id.description: serves a single review object from a given review_id

review.title: Culture a Love of Agriculture With Agricola
review.review_body: You could sum up Agricola with the simple phrase 'Farmyard Fun' but the mechanics and game play add so much more than that. You'll find yourself torn between breeding pigs, or sowing crops. Its joyeous and rewarding and it makes you think of time spent outside, which is much harder to do these days!

GET /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments from a given review_id

comments.body: Quis duis mollit ad enim deserunt.
comments.author: jessjelly

POST /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: post a comment object from request object to the comments table, serves the posted comment object

PATCH /api/reviews/:review_id.description: updates a review votes property from given inc_votes object and responds with the updated review object

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes the comment with given comment_id

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/users/:username.description: serves a user object with the given username
